subject: 128.101.240.212 not in sync
body:
The subject says it all.

$ host security.debian.org
security.debian.org has address 212.211.132.32
security.debian.org has address 212.211.132.250
security.debian.org has address 128.101.240.212
[...]

but running

wget -N http://security.debian.org/dists/etch/updates/main/binary-i386/Packages.gz

several times, Packages.gz is sometimes 62809 bytes long and sometimes
63861 bytes long.

Anybody here who can fix this mess?

Thanks.


-- 
To UNSUBSCRIBE, email to debian-mirrors-REQUEST@lists.debian.org
with a subject of "unsubscribe". Trouble? Contact listmaster@lists.debian.org
